segments.text: I'm watching this whole scene unfold, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely absorbed in drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on that one task, meticulously polishing the ceramic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water is just pouring over the sink's edge, creating a cascade.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a continuous sheet, flowing down the cabinet doors and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see her foot already standing right in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how oblivious someone can be to their immediate surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting wider and wider with every passing second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Soon, the entire floor will be submerged if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the potential water damage to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a mundane task, yet it's creating such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just keeps on polishing, entirely in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to be quite a clean-up job.
segments.speaker: PAR
